name: smartControl_getStatus
description: This function is used to check the smart control status of a specific compartment in SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check the smart control status.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment to check the smart control status.
